name: Archetype: I Died From Overwork Typing a 9000-Page Report and Woke Up In A Fantasy World?!
name_original: Archetype: I Died From Overwork Typing a 9000-Page Report and Woke Up In A Fantasy World?!
description:
I Died From Overwork Typing A 9000-Page Report And Woke Up In A Fantasy World?! Start a heroic roguelike journey in the crisis-riddled land of Clickclackia, where your greatest tools are your typing fingers! How fast can you go?!

This is our v0.66 Alpha demo, which features the forest dungeon and a short snippet of the main plot of Archetype. Please enjoy! 

There are still quite a bunch of placeholder backgrounds and images that will be replaced as development continues. Please stay tuned!

Controls:

  • Keyboard - All actions, including attacking, navigation, and selecting dialogue options.
  • Mouse - For selecting the name box at the start and certain shop options. We haven't quite coded it all in yet!
